name: DeployContainer

methods.name: addMetadata
methods.description: Add a custom metadata component to the container.

params.name: md
params.description: A custom metadata component class that derives from Metadata.Metadata. Avoid adding components to a Metadata.DeployContainerthat have the same Metadata.Metadata.fullName because it causes deployment errors.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.DeployContainer.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Retrieves a list of custom metadata components from the container.

methods.name: removeMetadata
methods.description: Removes a metadata component from the container.

methods.name: removeMetadataByFullName
methods.description: Removes a metadata component from the container using the componentâ€™s full name.

params.name: fullName
params.description: Full name of the component to remove.

description: Represents a container for custom metadata components to be deployed.
